directions: Add all ingredients to blender and process until smooth.
Serve immediately and garnish with whipped topping and chocolate chips if desired.
ingredients: 1 hot chocolate mix (Carnation Breakfast Essentials Powder in Rich Milk Chocolate, Classic Chocolate Malt, or Dark Chocolate)
1 banana (sliced into coins and frozen in advance)
light whipped topping and/or mini chocolate chips for garnish (optional)
title: Healthy Chunky Monkey Smoothie
